trans-unit.source: Built-In Desired State Configuration Resources for Linux
trans-unit.target: Recursos de configuración de estado deseado integrados para Linux

trans-unit.source: Resources are building blocks that you can use to write a PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) script.
trans-unit.target: Los recursos son bloques de creación que puede usar para escribir un script de configuración de estado deseado (DSC) de PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: DSC for Linux comes with a set of built-in functionality for configuring resources such as files and folders, packages, environment variables, and services and processes.
trans-unit.target: DSC para Linux incorpora un conjunto de funcionalidades integradas para configurar recursos tales como archivos y carpetas, paquetes, variables de entorno, servicios y procesos.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides a list of these resources and links to topics that describe them in detail.
trans-unit.target: En la tabla siguiente se ofrece una lista con estos recursos y vínculos a temas que los describen en detalle.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">nxArchive Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.tar, .zip) files at a specific path.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">Recurso nxArchive</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: ofrece un mecanismo para desempaquetar archivos de almacenamiento (.tar, .zip) en una ruta específica.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">nxEnvironment Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages environment variables on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">Recurso nxEnvironment</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: administra las variables de entorno en los nodos de destino.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileResource.md)">nxFile Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages Linux files and directories.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileResource.md)">Recurso nxFile</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: administra archivos y directorios de Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">nxFileLine Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages individual lines in a Linux file.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">Recurso nxFileLine</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: administra líneas individuales de un archivo de Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxGroupResource.md)">nxGroup Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux groups.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxGroupResource.md)">Recurso nxGroup</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: administra grupos locales de Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">nxPackage Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages packages on Linux nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">Recurso nxPackage</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: administra paquetes en nodos de Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">nxScript Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Runs scripts on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">Recurso nxScript</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: ejecuta scripts en nodos de destino.
<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxServiceResource.md)">Recurso nxService</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: administra servicios (demonios) de Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">nxSshAuthorizedKeys Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages public ssh keys for a Linux user.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">Recurso nxSshAuthorizedKeys</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: administra claves ssh públicas para un usuario de Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxUserResource.md)">nxUser Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux users.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxUserResource.md)">Recurso nxUser</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: administra usuarios locales de Linux.
